Attributes.description: Hones language skills, deepens knowledge of vocabulary and grammar structures, and develops a higher level of fluency in writing, reading and speaking. Emphasis on contextualized grammar and vocabulary, critical reading and discussion of texts. Aligned with CEFR level B2 objectives.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 11:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: B209
